results.name: Regular triangle where T(n,k) is the number of unlabeled k-uniform hypergraphs spanning n vertices.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..91
maple: h:= (p, v)-> (q-> add((s-> add(`if`(andmap(i-> irem(k[i], p[i]
A:= proc(n, k) A(n, k):= `if`(k>n-k, A(n, n-k), b(n$2, [], k)) end:
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..9);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 21 2019
program: rep(typ)={my(L=List(), k=0); for(i=1, #typ, k+=typ[i]; listput(L,k); while(#L<k, listput(L,#L))); Vec(L)}
Q(n,k,perm)={my(t=0); forsubset([n,k], v, t += can(Vec(v), t->perm[t])); t}
for(n=1, 10, for(k=1, n, print1(U(n,k)-U(n-1,k), ", ")); print) \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 10 2019
